name: Ultraman: Fighting Evolution
description:
Ultraman Fighting Evolution is a fighting game based on the Ultra series, a tokusatsu superhero series by Tsuburaya. The characters in the game are some of the characters that appeared in the original Ultraman TV show, Ultraseven, and Ultraman Taro. It is the first game in the Ultraman Fighting Evolution series.

There are four game modes that is available in the game. In arcade mode, the player, who must play as one of the Ultramen, will battle several kaijus. In versus mode, the player can choose which character he want to play as and which character to fight against. Players are able to choose whether to fight against the CPU or against another player. In survival mode, the player will go up against a barrage of enemies until the player loses his health. There is also the training mode where the player is able to train their skills with the characters.
